headline: Tube Packaging Market Key Segments, and Regional Dynamics with Manufacturers and Suppliers Data
summary: According to researchers from Towards Packaging, the global tube packaging market, estimated at USD 12.02 billion in 2025, is forecast to expand to USD 19.99 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 5.82% over the forecast period.Ottawa, Oct. 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The global tube packaging market generated revenue of USD 12.02 billion in 2025, and this figure is projected to grow to USD 19.99 billion in 2034, according to research conducted by Towards Packaging, a sister firm of Precedence R

headline: Europe Flexible Packaging Market Key Segments, and Regional Dynamics with Manufacturers and Suppliers Data
summary: The global Europe flexible packaging market was valued at USD 52.96 billion in 2025 and is expected to grow to USD 73.77 billion in 2034, as noted in a study published by Towards Packaging, a sister firm of Precedence Research.Ottawa, Oct. 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Europe flexible packaging market size surpassed USD 51.05 billion in 2024 and is estimated to hit around USD 73.77 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 3.75% from 2025 to 2034.
